Ken,

   While your point is well taken, the significance of the 
infrastru=
cture differences lies not primarily in the diversity of 
building blocks, =
with possible overhead associated with its effective 
application in a hype=
rcube network, but rather the leveraging of 
prior "knowledge" to a new but=
 similar problem through 
complexification around an static network-in-a-no=
de embedded in a 
NEAT hidden node of a new problem. I believe this to be t=
he "sine quo 
non" of creating more "brain-like" networks.

Thanks,
   Andy=
